entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is introduced as a witch who has been accused of misusing her wand. She is described as using someone else's wand.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is introduced as a person who is questioning Bellatrix about her wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a person who has taken Bellatrix's wand and is holding it up.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the next person Travers turns to after questioning Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix's wand
entities.description: Bellatrix's wand is introduced as an object that has been taken by Hermione.

relationships.description: Travers questions Bellatrix about her wand.
Hermione is holding up Bellatrix's wand.
Travers turns to Ron after questioning Bellatrix.
